name: IVC Venture Capital
overview:
As an established venture capital firm focusing on investments in high-growth technology companies. Our focus is on early-stage and expansion capital for innovative companies.

Our competitive advantage / USP, we count our many years of expertise in advising and supporting start-ups. We think here in particular to assist in financing needs, M & A activities and issues of domestic and external financial reporting. In addition, we have extensive experience in corporate management and risk management. We were able to achieve due to our excellent contacts with various public development institutions and co-lead investments in cooperation with the KfW banking group, in particular with the tbg Technologie-Beteiligungs Gesellschaft mbH.

We support our investments on their way to develop into successful companies that expand their market position continuously. This is not least in encouraging the corporate values of the investments to increase consistently and thus create the basis for a return on investment for our investors.
